Trapped.  It wasn't what he wanted.  There was no use wasting energy to bla=
st his way through the gates.  But the dart was annoying him, so he pulls i=
t out and throws it to the side.  He then looks around.

" Great, not what =
I was intending ta do.  Maan if Tucson was here now he'd be ticked off big =
time.  Yo, Perceptor, Windlord, can ya hear me?  I'm in a bit of a bind.  I=
 got my aft trapped by humans, who seem ta be from a more advanced time per=
iod.  Notify Lord Elder and tell him ta wire Tucson and the others.  This i=
s big, really big."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercy=
clonus@...> wrote:
>
> > <OLD>
> >

t rear leg, which causes him to roar
> > like an average panther.  Yet, he =
makes no moves to attack them.  The
> > average panther would have lunged a=
nd swiped at the Humans, yet he does
> > nothing of the sort.  He senses so=
mething different about these Humans.
> > They did not seem to belong in th=
e time period they were in.  They weren't
> > Protohuman. Therefore, he did=
n't need to keep his cover. He converts to
> > robot mode, looks to the dar=
t and back at the Humans.

ter, but seriously, I know you

big time explaining ta do."
> >

st, and a sharp eye on the Human who

 think about nail'n me with that thing again."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> "Ahh yes, a =
Maximal." The voice, the one that gave the command earlier
> could be heard=
, it had an arrogant humor in it as it spoke. He walked
> up carrying what =
could only be a flashlight, something totally unheard
> of for the protohum=
ans - The flashlight was strapped to his wrist.
> "You are smaller than you=
r Autobot cousins, but everything we heard
> about you is all the same."
> =

> The figure shined the light at NIGHTSHIFT for a moment and then down
> t=
he hall beyond him and then back. it showed that the gates covered
> the en=
tire width and nearly height of the tunnel on both sides.
> 
> "Come." The =
lead figure said to the other two. "We have what we need,
> let us check on=
 the Predacons."
> 
> They turn to walk back down the tunnel in the directi=
on they came in.
> 
> OOC: Keep in mind Nightshift is trapped between two s=
trong gates, one
> on each side of him. Perceptor and Windlord are on one s=
ide of the two

 the other
> side of the two gates - the side going further down the tunnel=
s.
